posts.title: How Modi government pushes the pedal on India’s growth story while reining in inflation
posts.desc: India’s 8.7 per cent GDP growth in FY22 is a glowing testimony to Modinomics and how Prime Minister Narendra Modi has been able to navigate India's powerful growth story into a sustainably stronger orbit

posts.title: Fan shows his tattoo to Roger Federer, here's how the Swiss tennis legend reacted
posts.desc: Roger Federer has been out of the game since his quarter-final defeat at Wimbledon almost one year ago. The tennis legend recently underwent his third knee surgery in 18 months.

posts.title: Indian Cricketers' Association welcomes BCCI's decision to increase pension of former players and umpires
posts.desc: BCCI has doubled the pension of former first-class and Test cricketers with those earning Rs 15,000 going up to Rs 30,000 and those with Rs 37,500 being upgraded to Rs 60,000 bracket. Those who received Rs 50,000 from now on will get Rs 70,000.

posts.title: US Open Golf 2022: John Rahm, Rory McIlroy get early starts with LIV in afternoon
posts.desc: World number two Rahm, a Spaniard who took his first major title last June at Torrey Pines, will start in the fourth group off the first tee on Thursday alongside James Piot, last year's US Amateur winner, and fellow American Collin Morikawa

posts.title: FIFA World Cup 2022 Qualifiers: Dancing goalkeeper Redmayne confirms Australia’s fifth consecutive appearance
posts.desc: The 33-year-old clowned his way along the goal line as Peru's players prepared to take their penalty kicks and his block of Alex Valera's shot gave Australia a 5-4 win after the two sides had been deadlocked without a goal for 120 minutes.

posts.title: I do believe Umran Malik should play: Sunil Gavaskar ahead of third India-South Africa T20I
posts.desc: India have failed to defend totals on both occasions in the two matches of the five-T20I series vs South Africa.

posts.title: Prophet Muhammad row: Nine detained in J&K's Bhaderwah; curfew relaxed in Kishtwar for five hours
posts.desc: Curfew was imposed in Bhaderwah and Kishtwar on Thursday following communal tension over the controversial remarks against Prophet Muhammad by Nupur Sharma and certain social media posts by local right-wing activists in her support

posts.title: From COVID-19 test for infants, to breastfeeding babies if positive; all you need to know if your child gets infected
posts.desc: Babies may be at higher risk if they are premature or have another underlying serious illness or condition. Studies describing COVID-19 in newborns reflect that similar to other respiratory viruses

posts.title: Looks like the Samsung Galaxy Fold 4 is shaping up to an iPad Pro rival
posts.desc: Samsung knows that Apple can’t be touched when it comes to Tablets. Maybe that is why, they are making the Galaxy Z Fold 4 as close to a tablet as they can. The upcoming Z Fold 4 will come with 1 TB storage, making a very close rival to the iPad Pro.

posts.title: Govt. of India issues high-severity warning for Google Chrome & Firefox users, here’s how to stay safe
posts.desc: CERT-In has flagged certain versions of Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox to be severely vulnerable to hackers and malicious programmes. There is, however, a very simple way to keep themselves safe and protected.

posts.title: Russia-Ukraine conflict: The battle of Donbas could prove decisive in Ukraine war
posts.desc: With the Russia-Ukraine conflict now in its fourth month, Moscow is pounding the Donbas region with relentless artillery and air raids, making slow but steady progress to seize the industrial heartland of its neighbour

posts.title: Bengal BJP's infighting comes to the fore amid JP Nadda's visit
posts.desc: According to state BJP sources, several party MLAs were not present at the state executive committee meeting held at the National Library and addressed by Nadda

posts.title: NBA Finals: Golden State Warriors on brink of title as Andrew Wiggins inspires Boston Celtics defeat
posts.desc: Golden State Warriors beat the Boston Celtics 104-94 on Monday night for a 3-2 NBA Finals lead as Andrew Wiggins bags 26 points and 13 rebounds.

posts.title: ENG vs NZ 2nd Test, Live cricket score and update
posts.desc: England and New Zealand live score update, watch ENG vs NZ 2nd Test match today

posts.title: Friday fury! It is not Nupur Sharma issue, it is the mindset
posts.desc: It is clear that the huge boisterous protests across the country on Friday were orchestrated. Accommodating such elements is not going to bring peace.

posts.title: Govt jobs for 10 lakh people by December 2023 as PM Modi reviews HR status in all ministries, departments
posts.desc: In a meeting with the secretaries on 2 April, Prime Minister Narendra Modi had stressed that employment should be the focus of all government interventions in both public and private sectors

posts.title: Man deadlifts 129.50 kg weight with one finger for 8 seconds, hits Guinness World Record
posts.desc: Keeler, who is 48 now, has been strength training for the past 4 years. During one of his strength training sessions with his training partner, he found out that his lifting ability was far above the norm and could possibly break a record.

posts.title: Pfizer vaccines for COVID-19 safe for children under five years, says US health officials
posts.desc: FDA posted its analysis of the Pfizer shot ahead of a Wednesday meeting where outside experts will vote on whether the shots are ready for the nation’s 18 million babies, toddlers and preschoolers

posts.title: Toyota is set to launch 3 new SUVs and 1 new MPV in India this year
posts.desc: In a bid to consolidate its position in the Indian market, Japanese automaker Toyota will be launching at least 3 new SUVs and 1 new MPV this year. These include the Hyryder, Land Cruiser, Innova Hycross and the new generation of the urban cruiser.

posts.title: Explained: Why Suzhal - The Vortex promises to be an intriguing watch
posts.desc: Sriya Reddy, Kathir and Aishwarya Rajesh starrer Suzhal: The Vortex will premiere in over 30 languages in 240 countries and territories exclusively on Amazon Prime Video on 17th June.

posts.title: Sushant Singh Rajput, you are missed
posts.desc: Today, 14th June marks the second death anniversary of Sushant Singh Rajput. The young star passed away at the 34 in 2020.

posts.title: National Herald case: 'Gandhi family falsely implicated', says Bhupesh Baghel as ED grills Rahul Gandhi
posts.desc: Calling the ED action on Gandhi 'malicious', the Chhattisgarh chief minister said that the Centre is using its agencies to 'suppress the voice of Opposition'

posts.title: Oppo launches the K10 5G in India, check out the specs, price and launch offers
posts.desc: Oppo launched the K10 5G in India, with a dual camera set up and a Dimensity 810 Soc and a 6.56-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate. The device is available in only one variant, a 8GB+128GB unit, which has been priced at Rs 17,499.

posts.title: Yami Gautam throws light on her upcoming releases
posts.desc: Actress Yami Gautam is currently in one of the best phases of her career. Not only is she giving back-to-back hits but is continuously proving her worth time and again.

posts.title: Indian women sold as slaves in West Asian nations: Why are we bowing to them then?
posts.desc: A government official reported that Indian women were ‘treated worse than cattle there’. One of the women who was interviewed did not even know where she was

posts.title: PM Modi to inaugurate underground museum in Mumbai: What you need to know
posts.desc: While the museum is special for its theme of the Indian Independence Movement, its location is equally significant as it has come up in a network of pre-World War I British-era bunkers that were discovered under the Raj Bhavan in 2016

posts.title: MG Motors’ entry-level EV for India uncovered, will be priced around Rs 10 Lakh
posts.desc: MG Motors India is planning to launch an ultra affordable EV sometime next year, which would cost about Rs 10 Lakhs. The upcoming EV will be based on a kei-car design, with 2 sliding doors, and 39bhp drive train.

posts.title: Mercedes Benz recalls one million cars, mainly SUVs and minivans, over fear of faulty brakes
posts.desc: Fearing that the corrosion on the brake booster can lead to catastrophic brake failure in some of their cars, Mercedes-Benz has recalled about 1 million cars from all across the world. The affected cars mainly include the ML & the GL line of cars, and some of their popular minivans or MPVs.

posts.title: Sushant Singh Rajput death anniversary: From Kai Po Che to Sonchiriya; here are some of his best films
posts.desc: Sushant Singh Rajput made his debut in the entertainment industry with a supporting role in Ekta Kapoor’s Kis Desh Mein Hai Meraa Dil. He got his big break in the show Pavitra Rishta, where he played the lead role.

posts.title: 780 cases of monkeypox reported or identified as of 2 June, says WHO
posts.desc: The sudden and unexpected appearance of monkeypox simultaneously in several non-endemic countries suggests that there might have been undetected transmission for some unknown duration of time followed by recent amplifier events

india.desc: The insurance coverage will be provided to pilgrims by United India Insurance Company Ltd on behalf of Manav Utthan Seva Samiti. It will be given to pilgrims if they meet with an accident on the premises
